name: The Stand In
summary_text: THE STAND-IN is the story of a disaffected comedy actress and her ambitious stand-in trading places.

name: Godzilla Singular Point
summary_text: Brought together by a mysterious song, a grad student and an engineer lead the fight against an unimaginable force that may spell doom for the world.

name: Re-Animator
summary_text: After an odd new medical student arrives on campus, a dedicated local and his girlfriend become involved in bizarre experiments centering around the re-animation of dead tissue.

name: American Me
summary_text: A Mexican-American Mafia kingpin is released from prison, falls in love for the first time, and grows introspective about his gangster lifestyle.

name: The Fog
summary_text: An unearthly fog rolls into a small coastal town exactly 100 years after a ship mysteriously sank in its waters.

name: Expedition: Back to the Future
summary_text: Josh Gates and Christopher Lloyd set out an epic journey in search of the iconic DeLeorean Time Machine from the "Back to the Future" trilogy of movies, hoping to deliver it to The Michael J. Fox Foundation.

name: Baki
summary_text: The protagonist, Baki Hanma, trains with an intense focus to become strong enough to surpass his father, Yujiro Hanma, the strongest fighter in the world.

name: Attack on Titan Part 1
summary_text: In a world where giant humanoid Titans prey on humans, Eren joins the scouting legion to get revenge on the monsters who killed everyone in his town.

name: Phobias
summary_text: Five dangerous patients, suffering from extreme phobias at a government testing facility, are put to the ultimate test under the supervision of a crazed doctor and his quest to weaponize fear.

name: Cold War
summary_text: In the 1950s, a music director falls in love with a singer and tries to persuade her to flee communist Poland for France.

name: The Widow
summary_text: A woman's search to uncover the mysterious disappearance of her husband leads her to the Congo, where she's forced to seek the truth about what happened to the man she loved.

name: Blades of Glory
summary_text: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.

name: Shoplifters
summary_text: A family of small-time crooks take in a child they find outside in the cold.

name: The Girl Who Believes in Miracles
summary_text: When young Sara hears a preacher say faith can move mountains, she starts praying. Suddenly, people in her town are mysteriously healed - but fame soon takes its toll.

name: Like a Boss
summary_text: Two friends with very different ideals start a beauty company together. One is more practical while the other wants to earn her fortune and live a lavish lifestyle.

name: America's Next Top Model
summary_text: A cyclical competition where women from all over the U.S. compete for the honor of being America's next "it girl" in the modeling world.

name: Clerks II
summary_text: A calamity at Dante and Randal's shops sends them looking for new horizons - but they ultimately settle at the fast food empire Mooby's.

name: Here Today
summary_text: When veteran comedy writer Charlie Burnz meets New York street singer Emma Payge, they form an unlikely yet hilarious and touching friendship that kicks the generation gap aside and redefines the meaning of love and trust.

name: Outsiders
summary_text: A story of struggle for power set in the rugged and mysterious hills of Appalachia.

name: Kickboxer
summary_text: Kurt Sloane must learn the ancient kick boxing art of Muay Thai in order to avenge his brother.

name: Pi
summary_text: A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature.

name: Star vs. the Forces of Evil
summary_text: Star Butterfly arrives on Earth to live with the Diazes, a Mexican-American family. She continues to battle villains throughout the universe and high school, mainly to protect her extremely powerful wand, an object that still confuses her.

name: Eight Is Enough
summary_text: This comedy drama focused on a family with eight very independent children.

name: Nurse Jackie
summary_text: A drug-addicted nurse struggles to find a balance between the demands of her frenetic job at a New York City hospital and an array of personal dramas.

name: Boyka: Undisputed
summary_text: In the fourth installment of the fighting franchise, Boyka is shooting for the big leagues when an accidental death in the ring makes him question everything he stands for.

name: Death of Me
summary_text: A vacationing couple must discover the mystery behind a strange video that shows one of them killing the other.

name: Friendsgiving
summary_text: Molly and Abbey, along with their crew of close friends and acquaintances, host a dysfunctional, comical and chaotic Thanksgiving dinner.

name: The Switch
summary_text: Seven years after the fact, a man comes to the realization that he was the sperm donor for his best friend's boy.

name: Howards End
summary_text: A businessman thwarts his wife's bequest of an estate to another woman.

name: The Equalizer
summary_text: A retired Intelligence Agent turned private detective helps various threatened clients to equalize the odds.

name: A Simple Plan
summary_text: Three blue-collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash and make a plan to keep their find from the authorities, but it isn't long before complications and mistrust weave their way into the plan.

name: The Darkest Hour
summary_text: In Moscow, five young people lead the charge against an alien race who have attacked Earth via our power supply.

name: The Happytime Murders
summary_text: When the puppet cast of a '90s children's TV show begin to get murdered one by one, a disgraced LAPD detective-turned-private eye puppet takes on the case.

name: Black Sheep Squadron
summary_text: The dramatized World War II adventures of U.S. Major Gregory "Pappy" Boyington and his U.S. Marine Attack Squadron 214, (The Black Sheep Squadron).

name: I Want to Eat Your Pancreas
summary_text: A high school student discovers one of his classmates, Sakura Yamauchi, is suffering from a terminal illness. This secret brings the two together, as she lives out her final moments.

name: House
summary_text: A troubled writer moves into a haunted house after inheriting it from his aunt.

name: The Great Indian Kitchen
summary_text: After marriage, a woman struggles to be the submissive wife that her husband and his family expect her to be. The story follows her journey, as she changes herself and, even more so, changes the household.

name: Avengement
summary_text: After years of assaults on him in prison, convicted felon Cain Burgess escapes for avengement on those responsible.

name: Ghosts of Mars
summary_text: In 2176, a Martian police unit is sent to pick up a highly dangerous criminal at a remote mining post. Upon arrival, the cops find that the post has become a charnel house.

name: The Cook, the Thief, His Wife & Her Lover
summary_text: At Le Hollandais gourmet restaurant, every night is filled with opulence, decadence and gluttony. But when the cook, a thief, his wife and her lover all come together, they unleash a shocking torrent of sex, food, murder and revenge.

name: My Policeman
summary_text: The arrival of Patrick into Marion and Tom's home, triggers the exploration of seismic events from 40 years previous.

name: The Flower of Evil
summary_text: "Flower of Evil" is a suspense melodrama about a man who hides his cruel past and changes his identity, while his detective wife tracks down his past.

name: The Silencers
summary_text: Retired agent Matt Helm is re-activated in order to stop an evil organization from exploding an atom bomb over the USA and starting WWIII.

name: Terra Nova
summary_text: Centers on the Shannons, an ordinary family from 2149 when the planet is dying, who are transported back 85 million years to prehistoric Earth where they join Terra Nova, a colony of humans with a second chance to build a civilization.

name: Life as We Know It
summary_text: Two single adults become caregivers to an orphaned girl when their mutual best friends die in an accident.

name: American Pie Presents: The Naked Mile
summary_text: When Erik Stifler gets a free pass to do whatever he wants from his girlfriend, he and his two best friends head to see his cousin Dwight for the Naked Mile and a weekend they will never forget.

name: The Rite
summary_text: American seminary student Michael Kovak (Colin O'Donaghue) travels to Italy to take an exorcism course.

name: Four Lions
summary_text: Four incompetent British terrorists set out to train for and commit an act of terror.

name: Twilight Zone: The Movie
summary_text: Four horror and science fiction segments, directed by four famous directors, each of them being a new version of a classic story from Rod Serling's landmark television series.

name: Don't F**k with Cats: Hunting an Internet Killer
summary_text: A group of online justice seekers track down a guy who posted a video of himself killing kittens.

name: Greenleaf
summary_text: The unscrupulous world of the Greenleaf family and their sprawling Memphis megachurch, dark secrets and lies.

name: Daybreakers
summary_text: In the year 2019, a plague has transformed almost every human into vampires. Faced with a dwindling blood supply, the fractured dominant race plots their survival; meanwhile, a researcher works with a covert band of vamps on a way to save humankind.

name: The Runaways
summary_text: A coming-of-age biographical film about the 1970s teenage all-girl rock band The Runaways. The relationship between band members Cherie Currie and Joan Jett is also explored.

name: TMNT
summary_text: When the world is threatened by an ancient evil, the four adolescent turtles must reunite and overcome their faults in order to stand against it.

name: The Concubine
summary_text: A tragic love triangle story between Hwa-Yeon, a daughter of a nobleman, her true love Kwon-Yoo, a servant and the man who will be King, Prince Sungwon.

name: Girl on the Third Floor
summary_text: Don Koch tries to renovate a rundown mansion with a sordid history for his growing family, only to learn that the house has other plans.

name: Sardar Ka Grandson
summary_text: A devoted grandson embarks on a complicated and comic journey to fulfill his ailing grandmother's last wish.

name: Rebel Without a Cause
summary_text: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

name: Make It or Break It
summary_text: Follows a group of teen Olympic hopefuls as they train and prepare for their day in the spotlight.

name: Last Shift
summary_text: A rookie cop's 1st shift alone in the last night of a closing police station turns into a living nightmare.

name: The Odd Couple
summary_text: After being kicked out of their houses by their wives, two friends try to share an apartment, but their ideas of housekeeping and lifestyles are as different as night and day.

name: The Jerry Springer Show
summary_text: Among his peers' other talk-shows, Jerry's is of the more passionate and of the more sensational. His topics range from bisexual affairs to rape. His guests sometimes get out of control and...                See full summary »

name: Little Monsters
summary_text: A boy discovers an incredible and gruesome world of monsters under his bed.

name: Sudden Impact
summary_text: A rape victim is exacting revenge on her aggressors in a small town outside San Francisco. "Dirty" Harry Callahan, on suspension for angering his superiors (again), is assigned to the case.

name: Queen & Slim
summary_text: A couple's first date takes an unexpected turn when a police officer pulls them over.

name: Wanderlust
summary_text: A therapist tries to save her marriage after a cycling accident causes them to reassess their relationship.

name: MADtv
summary_text: A sketch comedy show based on the seminal Mad Magazine.

name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules
summary_text: Back in middle school after summer vacation, Greg Heffley and his older brother Rodrick must deal with their parents' misguided attempts to have them bond.

name: Kiss Me
summary_text: A young woman engaged to be married finds herself in an affair with her soon-to-be stepmother's lesbian daughter.

name: Elephant
summary_text: Several ordinary high school students go through their daily routine as two others prepare for something more malevolent.

name: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
summary_text: Jack Ryan, as a young covert C.I.A. analyst, uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack.

name: A Dog's Purpose
summary_text: A dog looks to discover his purpose in life over the course of several lifetimes and owners.

name: Love Island
summary_text: Single hopefuls looking for love complete tasks, couple off and get voted out week by week. Packed full of drama.

name: The Babysitters
summary_text: A teenager turns her babysitting service into a call-girl service for married guys after fooling around with one of her customers.

name: Push
summary_text: Two young Americans with special abilities must race to find a girl in Hong Kong before a shadowy government organization called Division does.

name: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil
summary_text: A visiting city reporter's assignment suddenly revolves around the murder trial of a local millionaire, whom he befriends.

name: The Voices
summary_text: A likable guy pursues his office crush with the help of his evil talking pets, but things turn sinister when she stands him up for a date.

name: Bunheads
summary_text: Michelle, a Las Vegas showgirl marries a man on a whim and moves to his sleepy coastal town where she winds up working alongside her new mother-in-law at her dance school.

name: Man in an Orange Shirt
summary_text: Tales of love across two films highlighting the very different challenges that face the couples, With Michael and Thomas just after WWII, and Adam and Steve in the present day.

name: Claws
summary_text: A look at the life and crimes of five women who work at a Florida nail salon.

name: Bang Gang: A Modern Love Story
summary_text: In the well-to-do suburbs of a small town, a group of pretty average, well-adjusted sixteen and seventeen year olds are ordinary adolescents who take a singular path.

name: Scream 3
summary_text: While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, another Ghostface killer rises to terrorize them.

name: Kiss the Girls
summary_text: Police hunting for a serial kidnapper are helped when a victim manages to escape for the first time.

name: Cool Runnings
summary_text: When a Jamaican sprinter is disqualified from the Olympic Games, he enlists the help of a dishonored coach to start the first Jamaican Bobsled Team.

name: Battle of the Sexes
summary_text: The true story of the 1973 tennis match between World number one Billie Jean King and ex-champ and serial hustler Bobby Riggs.

name: Psycho-Pass
summary_text: Believing in humanity and order, policewoman Akane Tsunemori obeys the ruling, computerized, precognitive Sibyl System. But when she faces a criminal mastermind who can elude this "perfect" system, she questions both Sibyl and herself.

name: Dekalog
summary_text: Ten television drama films, each one based on one of the Ten Commandments.

name: The Two Popes
summary_text: Behind Vatican walls, the conservative Pope Benedict XVI and the liberal future Pope Francis must find common ground to forge a new path for the Catholic Church.

name: Cam
summary_text: Alice, an ambitious camgirl, wakes up one day to discover she's been replaced on her show with an exact replica of herself.

name: Get Smart
summary_text: Maxwell Smart, a highly intellectual but bumbling spy working for the CONTROL agency, battles the evil forces of rival spy agency KAOS with the help of his competent partner Agent 99.

name: Içerde
summary_text: A story of two brothers torn from each other. Now on the opposite sides of the law, brothers Sarp and Mert are put against each other, unaware of their fraternity.

name: Rollerball
summary_text: In a corporate-controlled future, an ultra-violent sport known as Rollerball represents the world, and one of its powerful athletes is out to defy those who want him out of the game.

name: Hustle
summary_text: A motley group of London con artists pulls off a series of daring and intricate stings.

name: Be Cool
summary_text: Disenchanted with the movie industry, Chili Palmer tries the music industry, meeting and romancing a widow of a music executive on the way.

name: Chicken Run
summary_text: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

name: Mona Lisa
summary_text: A man recently released from prison manages to get a job driving a call girl from customer to customer.

name: Friday the 13th Part 2
summary_text: Mrs. Voorhees is dead, and Camp Crystal Lake is shut down, but a camp next to the infamous place is stalked by an unknown assailant.

name: What to Expect When You're Expecting
summary_text: Follows the lives of five interconnected couples as they experience the thrills and surprises of having a baby and realize that no matter what you plan for, life does not always deliver what is expected.

name: Untitled Lakers Project
summary_text: The story of how the Los Angeles Lakers became the most successful professional basketball team in the 1980s.

name: Ali & the Queens
summary_text: After his father's passing, a teenager sets out for New York in search of his estranged mother and soon finds love and connection in unexpected places.

name: Army Wives
summary_text: Four women and one man share the common bond of loving someone in the U.S. Army.

name: Better Watch Out
summary_text: On a quiet suburban street, a babysitter must defend a twelve-year-old boy from intruders, only to discover it's far from a normal home invasion.

name: Ratchet & Clank
summary_text: When the galaxy comes under the threat of a nefarious space captain, a mechanic and his newfound robot ally join an elite squad of combatants to save the universe.

name: Goosebumps
summary_text: A teenager teams up with the daughter of young adult horror author R. L. Stine after the writer's imaginary demons are set free on the town of Madison, Delaware.

name: August Rush
summary_text: An orphaned musical prodigy uses his gift to try to find his birth parents.

name: The Maltese Falcon
summary_text: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.

name: My Summer in Provence
summary_text: Lea, Adrian, and their little brother Theo, born deaf, go on holiday in Provence with their grandfather, Paul "Oliveron" they never met because of a family quarrel. Unfortunately, it is not...                See full summary »

name: Z-O-M-B-I-E-S 2
summary_text: The continuing adventures of Seabrook High students Addison and Zed, whose budding romance is threatened by the arrival of werewolves.

name: By the Sea
summary_text: A couple tries to repair their marriage while staying at a hotel in France.

name: Spiral
summary_text: A same-sex couple move to a small town to enjoy a better quality of life and raise their daughter with strong social values. But when neighbors throw a very strange party, nothing is as it seems in their picturesque neighborhood.

name: Juice
summary_text: Four inner-city teenagers get caught up in the pursuit of power and happiness, which they refer to as "the juice".

name: Ouija: Origin of Evil
summary_text: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widowed mother and her daughters add a new stunt to bolster their seance scam business by inviting an evil presence into their home, not realizing how dangerous it is.

name: Gomer Pyle: USMC
summary_text: The misadventures of a bumbling U.S. Marine named Gomer Pyle.

name: Taggart
summary_text: The Maryhill CID investigates gruesome murders against the bleak backdrop of the city of Glasgow.

name: The Jesus Rolls
summary_text: A trio of misfits whose irreverent, sexually charged dynamic evolves into a surprising love story as their spontaneous and flippant attitude towards the past or future backfires time and again.

name: Jason X
summary_text: Jason Voorhees returns with a new look, a new machete, and his same murderous attitude as he is awakened on a spaceship in the 25th century.

name: The Forbidden Kingdom
summary_text: A discovery made by a kung fu obsessed American teen sends him on an adventure to China, where he joins up with a band of martial arts warriors in order to free the imprisoned Monkey King.

name: Match Game
summary_text: The five-day-a-week syndicated successor to the popular CBS game show, where two could compete to match fill-in-the-blank phrases with those of the celebrities.

name: The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind
summary_text: Against all the odds, a thirteen-year-old boy in Malawi invents an unconventional way to save his family and village from famine.

name: Phantasm
summary_text: A teenage boy and his friends face off against a mysterious grave robber, known only as the Tall Man, who employs a lethal arsenal of unearthly weapons.

name: The Food That Built America
summary_text: Food will tell the unknown stories of innovation and rivalries behind food industry tycoons Milton Hershey, John and Will Kellogg, Henry Heinz, C.W. Post, the McDonald brothers and more.

name: Step Up 3D
summary_text: A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers find themselves pitted against the world's best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown.

name: The Great Race
summary_text: In the early 20th century, two rivals, the heroic Leslie and the despicable Professor Fate, engage in an epic automobile race from New York to Paris.

name: Poison Ivy
summary_text: A seductive teen befriends an introverted high school student and schemes her way into the lives of her wealthy family.

name: Joe
summary_text: An ex-con, who is the unlikeliest of role models, meets a 15-year-old boy and is faced with the choice of redemption or ruin.

name: Channel Zero
summary_text: An anthology series based on popular Internet Creepypastas Candle Cove, The No-End House, Butcher's Block, and The Dream Door.

name: Halo Infinite
summary_text: After being found adrift in space, Spartan 117 The Master Chief is once again called to action. A rogue faction separate from The Covenant called The Banished have taken control over a Halo...                See full summary »

name: Catch-22
summary_text: Limited series adaptation of the classic Joseph Heller novel. Follows Captain John Yossarian and airmen in World War II.

name: We Own the Night
summary_text: A New York City nightclub manager tries to save his brother and father from Russian Mafia hitmen.

name: Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Next Generation
summary_text: A group of teenagers get into a car crash in the Texas woods on prom night, and then wander into an old farmhouse that is home to Leatherface (Robert Jacks) and his insane family of cannibalistic psychopaths.

name: X-Men: The Animated Series
summary_text: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

name: Brassic
summary_text: The lives of Vinnie and Dylan, who have grown up together and are inseparable. When Dylan's girlfriend wants to move in search of a better life for her and her child, Dylan must face the hardest decision of his life.

name: The Postman Always Rings Twice
summary_text: The sensuous wife of a lunch wagon proprietor and a rootless drifter begin a sordidly steamy affair and conspire to murder her Greek husband.

name: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
summary_text: Scooby-Doo and the gang attempt to solve creepy mysteries in the town of Crystal Cove, a place with a history of eerie supernatural events.

name: Justice League
summary_text: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

name: Skyscraper
summary_text: A security expert must infiltrate a burning skyscraper, 225 stories above ground, when his family is trapped inside by criminals.

name: Daddy Day Care
summary_text: Two men, Charlie Hinton (Eddie Murphy) and Phil Ryerson (Jeff Garlin), get laid off and have to become stay-at-home dads when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day-care center.

name: The Nanny Diaries
summary_text: A college graduate goes to work as a nanny for a rich New York family. Ensconced in their home, she has to juggle their dysfunction, a new romance, and the spoiled brat in her charge.

name: On the Waterfront
summary_text: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

name: Mr. Bean's Holiday
summary_text: Mr. Bean wins a trip to Cannes where he unwittingly separates a young boy from his father and must help the two reunite. On the way he discovers France, bicycling, and true love.

name: Feel the Beat
summary_text: After failing to find success on Broadway, April returns to her hometown and reluctantly is recruited to train a misfit group of young dancers for a big competition.

name: Once Were Warriors
summary_text: A family descended from Maori warriors is bedeviled by a violent father and the societal problems of being treated as outcasts.

name: Little Boy Blue
summary_text: The story about the murder of an 11-year-old boy, Rhys Jones in Croxteth, Liverpool, in 2007 and his parents, Melanie's and Steve's ordeal, and how Rhys's murderer and associates were eventually brought to justice.

name: Pasture
summary_text: A woman suffering from schizophrenia is taken against her will by a mad doctor. As she is subjected to insane experiments by the doctor she loses her final grip on reality.

name: Juliet, Naked
summary_text: Juliet, Naked is the story of Annie (the long-suffering girlfriend of Duncan) and her unlikely transatlantic romance with once revered, now faded, singer-songwriter, Tucker Crowe, who also happens to be the subject of Duncan's musical obsession.

name: Roslund & Hellström: Box 21
summary_text: A young Romanian woman named Lidia is lured to Sweden with promises of a better life, but is instead forced into prostitution. In search of revenge, her fate is interwoven with police officer Ewert Grens who chases a dangerous criminal.

name: Grosse Pointe Blank
summary_text: Martin Blank is a professional assassin. He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion party is taking place there at the same time.

name: Have Gun - Will Travel
summary_text: The adventures of a gentlemanly gunfighter for hire.

name: Agora
summary_text: A historical drama set in Roman Egypt, concerning a slave who turns to the rising tide of Christianity in the hope of pursuing freedom while falling in love with his mistress, the philosophy and mathematics professor Hypatia of Alexandria.

name: Berlin Station
summary_text: Follows a CIA team in Berlin and their clandestine activities.

name: Freddy Got Fingered
summary_text: An unemployed cartoonist moves back in with his parents and younger brother Freddy. When his parents demand he leave, he begins to spread rumors that his father is sexually abusing Freddy.

name: Frequency
summary_text: An accidental cross-time radio link connects father and son across 30 years. The son tries to save his father's life, but then must fix the consequences.

name: The Burning
summary_text: A former summer camp caretaker, horribly burned from a prank gone wrong, lurks around an upstate New York summer camp bent on killing the teenagers responsible for his disfigurement.

name: Filthy Rich
summary_text: The heirs of a wealthy Southern businessman hatch a plan to get a piece of his fortune.

name: Perfect
summary_text: A female aerobics instructor meets a male reporter doing a story on health clubs, but it isn't love at first sight.

name: Eiffel
summary_text: The government is asking Eiffel to design something spectacular for the 1889 Paris World Fair, but Eiffel simply wants to design the subway. Suddenly, everything changes when Eiffel crosses paths with a mysterious woman from his past.

name: The Willoughbys
summary_text: Convinced they'd be better off raising themselves, the Willoughby children hatch a sneaky plan to send their selfish parents on vacation. The siblings then embark on their own high-flying adventure to find the true meaning of family.

name: CSI: Vegas
summary_text: Facing an existential threat that could bring down the Crime Lab, a brilliant team of forensic investigators must welcome back old friends and deploy new techniques to preserve and serve justice in Sin City.

name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
summary_text: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

name: Let's Be Cops
summary_text: Two struggling pals dress as police officers for a costume party and become neighborhood sensations. But when these newly-minted "heroes" get tangled in a real life web of mobsters and dirty detectives, they must put their fake badges on the line.

name: Society
summary_text: An ordinary teenage boy discovers his family is part of a gruesome orgy cult for the social elite.

name: Lethal Weapon 4
summary_text: With personal crises and age weighing in on them, LAPD officers Riggs and Murtaugh must contend with deadly Chinese triads that are trying to free their former leaders out of prison and onto American soil.

name: The Diary of a Teenage Girl
summary_text: A teen artist living in 1970s San Francisco enters into an affair with her mother's boyfriend.

name: Short Term 12
summary_text: A 20-something supervising staff member of a residential treatment facility navigates the troubled waters of that world alongside her co-worker and longtime boyfriend.

name: Quo vadis, Aida?
summary_text: Aida is a translator for the UN in the small town of Srebrenica. When the Serbian army takes over the town, her family is among the thousands of citizens looking for shelter in the UN camp.

name: Compliance
summary_text: A normal Friday service at a fast food restaurant becomes interrupted by a police officer who claims an employee stole from a customer, but something more sinister is going on.

name: To Sir, with Love
summary_text: Idealistic engineer-trainee and his experiences in teaching a group of rambunctious white high school students from the slums of London's East End.

name: The Rising of the Shield Hero
summary_text: Stories of old tell of four otherworldly heroes - wielding the sword, spear, bow, and shield - who defended the land from wave after wave of calamity. With the fate of the world in balance,...                See full summary »

name: Who Am I
summary_text: Benjamin, a young German computer whiz, is invited to join a subversive hacker group that wants to be noticed on the world's stage.

name: Leatherface
summary_text: A teenage Leatherface escapes from a mental hospital with three other inmates, kidnapping a young nurse and taking her on a road trip from hell, while being pursued by a lawman out for revenge.

name: 28 Days
summary_text: A big-city newspaper columnist is forced to enter a drug and alcohol rehab center after ruining her sister's wedding and crashing a stolen limousine.

name: 3 Days to Kill
summary_text: A dying CIA agent trying to reconnect with his estranged daughter is offered an experimental drug that could save his life in exchange for one last assignment.

name: Ride or Die
summary_text: Rei helps the woman she's been in love with for years escape her abusive husband. While on the run, their feelings for each other catch fire.

name: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
summary_text: Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa.

name: Only Murders in the Building
summary_text: Three strangers who share an obsession with true crime suddenly find themselves caught up in one.

name: Out of Death
summary_text: A corrupt Sheriff's department in a rural mountain town comes undone when an unintended witness throws a wrench into their shady operation.

name: Dystopia
summary_text: Our world is dying; a pair of scientists attempting to create the world first teleporter manage to create something even more powerful: time machines. But their actions have unintended consequences, with the butterfly effect taking hold.

name: The Sessions
summary_text: A man in an iron lung who wishes to lose his virginity contacts a professional sex surrogate with the help of his therapist and priest.

name: Boiler Room
summary_text: A college dropout, attempting to live up to his father's high standards, gets a job as a broker for a suburban investment firm which puts him on the fast track to success. But the job might not be as legitimate as it first appeared to be.

name: Far Cry 6
summary_text: As dictator of Yara, Anton Castillo is intent on restoring his nation back to its former glory by any means, with his son, Diego, following in his bloody footsteps.

name: Cop Land
summary_text: The Sheriff of a suburban New Jersey community, populated by New York City police officers, slowly discovers the town is a front for mob connections and corruption.

name: Only God Forgives
summary_text: Julian, a drug-smuggler thriving in Bangkok's criminal underworld, sees his life get even more complicated when his mother compels him to find and kill whoever is responsible for his brother's recent death.

name: Embattled
summary_text: A son aspires to follow in his famous MMA father's footsteps, but along his journey must figure out how to break the abusive cycle, if possible, that his father has continued.

name: Case 39
summary_text: A social worker fights to save a girl from her abusive parents, only to discover that the situation is more dangerous than she ever expected.

name: Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over
summary_text: Carmen's caught in a virtual reality game designed by the Kids' new nemesis, the Toymaker. It's up to Juni to save his sister, and ultimately the world.

name: Pirate Radio
summary_text: A band of rogue DJs that captivated Britain, playing the music that defined a generation and standing up to a government that wanted classical music, and nothing else, on the airwaves.

name: Sleeping Beauty
summary_text: After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break, along with the help of three good fairies.

name: Hedwig and the Angry Inch
summary_text: A gender-queer punk-rock singer from East Berlin tours the U.S. with her band as she tells her life story and follows the former lover/band-mate who stole her songs.

name: Storks
summary_text: Storks have moved on from delivering babies to packages. But when an order for a baby appears, the best delivery stork must scramble to fix the error by delivering the baby.

name: The Company You Keep
summary_text: After a journalist discovers his identity, a former Weather Underground activist goes on the run.

name: The Big Easy
summary_text: A corrupt lieutenant in the homicide division is threatened by the righteous DA while trying to solve a string of mysterious murders.
The famous 1970s New York City nightclub seen and told through the eyes of a young employee.

name: PK
summary_text: An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship. His innocent nature and child-like questions force the country to evaluate the impact of religion on its people.

name: Hidden
summary_text: Police investigate when the body of a girl is found in a lake.

name: DOMINO: Battle of the Bones
summary_text: Domino: Battle of the Bones is a feel-good comedy about an elderly black man who teams up with his awkward, white step-grandson to defeat his rival in a domino tournament.

name: Summer of Sam
summary_text: Spike Lee's take on the "Son of Sam" murders in New York City during the summer of 1977 centering on the residents of an Italian-American Northeast Bronx neighborhood who live in fear and distrust of one another.

name: Revolution Rent
summary_text: A Cuban-American director travels to his exiled parents' homeland to mount a stage production of the musical, RENT, where he discovers an inspiring artistic family and embarks on a personal journey to reclaim his complicated heritage.

name: Rectify
summary_text: Daniel Holden must put his life back together after serving 19 years on Georgia's Death Row before DNA evidence calls his conviction into question.

name: Passion
summary_text: The rivalry between the manipulative boss of an advertising agency and her talented protégée escalates from stealing credit to public humiliation to murder.

name: Blinded by the Light
summary_text: In England in 1987, a teenager from an Asian family learns to live his life, understand his family and find his own voice through the music of American rock star Bruce Springsteen.

name: Robert the Bruce
summary_text: The story of the nobleman-turned-outlaw hero who was crowned king of Scots in the 14th century.

name: Terminal
summary_text: A film noir taking place in a train terminal at night. Add 2 male assassins, female assassin, waitress, teacher, janitor and crime boss. Add revenge. Who says mystery is a lost art?

name: An Easy Girl
summary_text: Naima is 16 and lives in Cannes. She has given herself the summer to choose what she wants to do with her life. Then her cousin Sofia, with her alluring lifestyle, arrives to spend the holidays with her.

name: Paprika
summary_text: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it.

name: The Manchurian Candidate
summary_text: A former prisoner of war is brainwashed as an unwitting assassin for an international Communist conspiracy.

name: Color of Night
summary_text: A color-blind psychiatrist Bill Capa is stalked by an unknown killer after taking over his murdered friend's therapy group, all of whom have a connection to a mysterious young woman that Capa begins having intense sexual encounters with.

name: Look Away
summary_text: Maria, an alienated high-school student, has her life turned upside down when she switches places with her sinister mirror image.

name: Gulliver's Travels
summary_text: Travel writer Lemuel Gulliver takes an assignment in Bermuda but ends up on the island of Lilliput, where he towers over its tiny citizens.

name: Space Truckers
summary_text: A space trucker and his cute fiancee are on their way from a space station to Earth with an unknown cargo. When space pirates hijack them, 5000 disintegrator robots are found in the cargo.

name: Picnic at Hanging Rock
summary_text: During a rural summer picnic, a few students and a teacher from an Australian girls' school vanish without a trace. Their absence frustrates and haunts the people left behind.
Several women enter a science fiction author's life over the course of a few years, after the author has lost the woman he considers his one true love.

name: Midnight Express
summary_text: Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.

name: Pompeii
summary_text: A slave-turned-gladiator finds himself in a race against time to save his true love, who has been betrothed to a corrupt Roman Senator. As Mount Vesuvius erupts, he must fight to save his beloved as Pompeii crumbles around him.

name: The Meyerowitz Stories
summary_text: An estranged family gathers together in New York City for an event celebrating the artistic work of their father.

name: Rosewood
summary_text: Miami pathologist Dr. Beaumont Rosewood, Jr. finds secrets in people's bodies using his state-of-the-art laboratory equipment.

name: The Circle
summary_text: Players start off isolated in an apartment, and with their online interactions as their only means of any communication. The players use a social media platform called "The Circle".

name: Pan Am
summary_text: Period drama about the pilots and flight attendants who once made Pan Am the most glamorous way to fly.

name: If Beale Street Could Talk
summary_text: A young woman embraces her pregnancy while she and her family set out to prove her childhood friend and lover innocent of a crime he didn't commit.

name: Nash Bridges
summary_text: A smart alecky San Francisco, California cop and his get rich quick scheme of a partner keep tabs on crime and take down the bad guys in the Bay Area.

name: 30 Coins
summary_text: An exiled priest tries to escape his demons while living in a remote village in Spain.

name: Final Destination 5
summary_text: Death returns to claim the lucky survivors of a deadly bridge collapse in this fifth frightening installment in the series.

name: The Aftermath
summary_text: Post World War II, a British colonel and his wife are assigned to live in Hamburg during the post-war reconstruction, but tensions arise with the German who previously owned the house.

name: A Score to Settle
summary_text: An ex-enforcer for a local crime syndicate has vowed to enact retribution on his mob bosses after 19 years of wrongful imprisonment. The only thing diverting his violent plans is a new found relationship to his beloved son.

name: The Testament of Sister New Devil
summary_text: First-year high school student, Toujo Basara, was suddenly have two beautiful step-sisters adopted by his father. But Mio and Maria's true forms are actually the newbie Demon Lord and a succubus!?

name: Mosul
summary_text: A police unit from Mosul fight to liberate the Iraqi city from thousands of ISIS militants.

name: Doctor Foster: A Woman Scorned
summary_text: A woman suspects her husband of having an affair. After following several lines of inquiry far more unravels including a streak of violence below the surface.

name: The Legend of Zorro
summary_text: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Don Alejandro de la Vega and his wife, Elena, to take action.

name: Olive Kitteridge
summary_text: A middle-school math teacher Olive and her marriage with Henry which spans 25 years.

name: The Oval
summary_text: Newly-elected U.S. President Hunter Franklin and his family move into the White House.

name: Fired Up!
summary_text: The two most popular guys in high school decide to ditch football camp for cheerleader camp. For the girls and for the glory.

name: The Venture Bros.
summary_text: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

name: Pandora
summary_text: Set in the year 2199, a young woman who has lost everything finds a new life at Earth's Space Training Academy where she learns to defend the galaxy from intergalactic threats.

name: Hear My Song
summary_text: The owner of a failing club seeks infamous Irish singer Josef Locke in order to bring business and success to his club.

name: Concussion
summary_text: In Pittsburgh, accomplished pathologist Dr. Bennet Omalu uncovers the truth about brain damage in football players who suffer repeated concussions in the course of normal play.

name: She's Gotta Have It
summary_text: The story of one woman and her three lovers. TV series based on the film by Spike Lee.

name: Batman: The Long Halloween, Part Two
summary_text: The killer known as Holiday continues to stalk the Falcone crime family while a new class of costumed criminal rises in Gotham City. Batman suspects that a former ally might be the serial killer.

name: Sanford and Son
summary_text: The misadventures of a cantankerous junk dealer and his frustrated son.

name: Macbeth
summary_text: Macbeth, the Thane of Glamis, receives a prophecy from a trio of witches that one day he will become King of Scotland. Consumed by ambition and spurred to action by his wife, Macbeth murders his king and takes the throne for himself.

name: Nayattu
summary_text: Three police officers who are on a run for life, escaping the outbreak against them due to the unlawful arrest and torture of a civilian. It brings in a few shades of arrogant yet very much human police officers and their helplessness.

name: Now & Later
summary_text: Angela an illegal immigrant living in Los Angeles stumbles across Bill, a disgraced banker on the run.Through sex, conversation ranging from politics to philosophy, and other worldly pleasures, Angela introduces Bill to another worldview.

name: The Hidden Face
summary_text: Shattered by the unexpected news of their irreversible break-up, an aspiring orchestra conductor is puzzled by his girlfriend's mysterious and seemingly inexplicable case of disappearance. But, can he look beyond the facts?

name: Star Wars: Clone Wars
summary_text: The events and battles of the Galactic Republic's last major war are recounted.

name: Inside
summary_text: Four months after the death of her husband, a woman on the brink of motherhood is tormented in her home by a strange woman who wants her unborn baby.

name: Mosagallu
summary_text: The story of the world's biggest I.T. scam.

name: Elvira: Mistress of the Dark
summary_text: Upon arriving in a small town where she has inherited a rundown mansion, a famous horror hostess battles an evil uncle, and townspeople who want her burned at the stake.

name: Transporter 2
summary_text: Transporter Frank Martin, surfaces in Miami, Florida and is implicated in the kidnapping of the young son of a powerful USA official.

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets
summary_text: A poor, straight A student is hired to tutor some rich quintuplets. The story is told as a flashback from a future that shows that he ends up getting married to one of them.

name: The Conjuring 2 Remake
summary_text: The supernatural thriller brings another real case from the files of renowned demonologists Ed and Lorraine Warren.

name: Dangerous Liaisons
summary_text: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

name: Beyond the Valley of the Dolls
summary_text: Three girls come to Hollywood to make it big, but find only sex, drugs and sleaze.
